status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5hdi0","text":"Refer to BAF_Protocol_008 Metabolomics: Soluble Metabolite Extraction for soluble metabolite extraction of a sample of interest and dry the extracted metabolites.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3knl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6cs3b","text":"Prepare a stock solution of each standard at 10 mg/mL in 75% MeOH. Use the stock solution to generate a 1000 ug/mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"15npd","text":"Solubilize metabolite extracts in    of 75% methanol ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"em6v6","text":"Add    of each into a clean new Eppendorf tube      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3e4jh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3c6s1","text":"Reagent powder storage: EDC is stored at -20C, all others are at room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5roe1","text":"Prepare working solutions on small glass botles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4g33t","text":"7,5% pyridine in 75% methanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7qh90","text":"--\u003e add 750 uL in 9.25 mL of 75% methanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2dr0a","text":" 150 mM EDC (stored at -20C) in 100% methanol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn75","text":"--\u003e dissolve 28.75 mg in 1 mL methanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5722d","text":"2 mg/mL BHT in 100% methanol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"chdve","text":"--\u003e dissolve 2 mg in 1 mL methanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"81eaj","text":"250 nM 3-NPH solution as derivatization agent in 50% methanol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":21}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14n0g","text":"--\u003e dissolve 47.4 mg of 3-NPH in 1 mL of 50% methanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d1s1e","text":"To each sample or standard add:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cn7kb","text":"   of 150 mM EDC,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5l5h5","text":"  of 7,5% pyridine,","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ecea1","text":"Incubate in thermomixer at 30 ºC","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bstn9","text":"Add     of each standard curve level into a clean new Eppendorf tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"be74n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"i852","text":" Dilute with    of water making a total of volume of    and to achieve 40% methanol at final sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8k134","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"843s4","text":"Samples are ready to be analyzed by LC-MS/MS. Use 40% methanol as blank runs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6pcu5","text":"Column: Acquity UPLC BEH C-18 1.7 um 2.1 x 150 mm (Waters)","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7jvb3","text":"Solvent A: 0.1% FA in water","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pi9s","text":"Solvent B: 0.1% FA in 90% methanol","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4hv9","text":"Flow = 0.250 ml/min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s32r","text":"Gradient: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ebtg","text":"0-1 min 50%B; 1-5 min 70% B; 5-8 min 98% B; 8-13 98% B;  13-13.1 min 15%B.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
